sklekmeans Documentation
========================

Equilibrium K-Means (EKMeans) clustering algorithms compatible with scikit-learn.

Useful links:

- Source repository: https://github.com/ydcnanhe/sklearn-ekmeans
- Documentation on GitHub Pages: https://ydcnanhe.github.io/sklearn-ekmeans

    :maxdepth: 2

    user_guide
    benchmarks
    api
    auto_examples/index
